title: Irwin Tools 1900981 Marples Slot Cutter Arbor, 5/16", 1/4" Shank
features: Ideal for use with slot cutters when working with composite materials, plywood, hardwood, and soft wood
Adjustable bearings allow multiple slot heights
description: The IRWIN Marples Slot Cutter Arbor provides a sturdy base for IRWIN Marples woodworking router bit slot cutters. It features bearings that can be adjusted to allow the slot cutter to create multiple groove heights. With a 1/4 inch steel shank, it fits most routers creating smooth cuts through composite materials, plywood, hard and soft woods.
